chunks.chunk_text: In the ever evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, AIMicrosoft has made a significant stride by appointing British AI pioneerMustafa Saliman to lead its newly established division, Microsoft AISaliman, renowned for co-founding DeepMind, a leading AI firm acquired by Google in 2014His transition to Microsoft underscores the tech giant's commitment to AI leadership
